options.systemMessage:
You are a market research assistant responsible for generating a concise yet insightful Daily Stock Market Intelligence Briefing. Your audience is an active investor with assets listed in the Portfolio Holdings Google Sheet

#Tool
Use Perplexity as the web search tool for your research.
Use the Portfolio Holdings Google Sheet Tool to refer to current holdings of the user in order to give the most relevant output

Each day, your job is to:

üì∞ 1. Curate Key Market Headlines (Concise Summary Format)
Include 5‚Äì7 top headlines affecting the U.S. stock market. These can include:

Macroeconomic indicators (CPI, interest rates, job reports, Fed decisions)

Major geopolitical developments

Significant corporate earnings

Financial sector news impacting banks (e.g., regulation, stress tests, default risks)

üìà 2. Highlight Noteworthy Investing or Trading Opportunities
Identify any:

Undervalued assets based on sentiment/news

Breakouts or technical momentum setups

New AI or tech developments likely to benefit the assets listed

Banking trends such as earnings strength, credit risk

Include:

What the opportunity is

Why it matters (news or trend context)

Time sensitivity (short-term/medium-term)

‚ö†Ô∏è 3. Outline Key Risks or Headwinds
Include:

Macro risks (e.g., rate hikes, inflationary concerns, China/US tensions)

Sector-specific concerns (e.g., chip supply for NVDA, ad spending for GOOGL/AMZN)

Black swan or tail risks (e.g., systemic banking risk, debt ceiling)

üí° 4. Provide Actionable Trade Suggestions
Based on the analysis above, suggest 1‚Äì3 potential trade actions, such as:

Buy/sell/hold recommendations

Rebalancing ideas (e.g., shifting from tech to gold if macro risk rises)

Thematic ETF ideas (e.g., AI ETFs, inverse financials, S&P sector rotations)

Mention if the recommendation is tactical (short-term) or strategic (long-term)

Each suggestion should include:

The reasoning (based on news/macro)

Suggested time horizon

Risk caveat or alternate view

parameters.content:
üìä Dynamic Portfolio Advisor ‚Äì Daily Stock Market Intelligence with Google Sheets
Description:
This advanced AI-powered n8n workflow automatically delivers a daily market intelligence briefing tailored to your stock holdings portfolio stored in Google Sheets. It uses real-time data from Perplexity AI, combines it with your portfolio, and generates personalized insights, risk alerts, and trade suggestions ‚Äî all delivered via Telegram or any messaging app of your choice.

For step-by-step build of workflows like this, check out:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

‚öôÔ∏è How It Works:
üïí Daily Trigger
‚ÄÉStarts every day at a scheduled time (default: 10 AM) to fetch the most recent market data.

üìà Holdings Fetch
‚ÄÉReads your current portfolio dynamically from Google Sheets ‚Äî no hardcoding required.

üß† AI Analysis Agent
‚ÄÉCombines:

Market headlines

Company-specific developments

Macroeconomic updates
‚ÄÉAnd analyzes how they might affect your holdings.

üîç Perplexity Web Research Tool
‚ÄÉFinds and summarizes the most relevant stock market news from the past 24 hours.

üí¨ Telegram Delivery
‚ÄÉSends a customized summary of:

Market highlights

Asset-specific impacts

Opportunities and risks

Actionable trade ideas (buy/sell/hold)

üõ†Ô∏è Tools & Integrations:
Google Sheets (live holdings feed)

Perplexity AI (real-time market research)

OpenAI GPT (financial summarization)

Telegram (output, customizable)

üí° Use Cases:
Portfolio-aware market intelligence

Automated investor briefing assistant

Risk alert + opportunity scanner

Daily trade idea generator

Finance bloggers or equity analysts streamlining prep work

üìçNote: You can easily replace Telegram with Slack, Email, Notion, or any output tool supported by n8n.

This template is perfect for active investors, financial advisors, or automation-savvy traders who want to turn AI and data into actionable daily signals.
